options.tex: \[ \left[ \dfrac{\sqrt{1+\sin x} + \sqrt{1-\sin x}}{\sqrt{1+\sin x} - \sqrt{1-\sin x}}\right] = \dfrac{\sin x}{1-\cos x}\]
\[ \left[ \dfrac{\sqrt{1+\sin x} + \sqrt{1-\sin x}}{\sqrt{1+\sin x} - \sqrt{1-\sin x}}\right] = \dfrac{\cos x}{1+\cos x}\]
